sqlMap.statement: SELECT SMS.SVC_MOD_STS_PK AS SVC_MOD_STS_PK ,SMS.SVC_MOD_PK AS SVC_MOD_PK ,SMS.SVC_MOD_DTL_PK AS SVC_MOD_DTL_PK ,SMS.SVC_MACH_MSTR_PK AS SVC_MACH_MSTR_PK ,SMS.SVC_TASK_NUM AS SVC_TASK_NUM ,SMS.SVC_MOD_OPT_CD AS SVC_MOD_OPT_CD ,SMS.SVC_MOD_OPT_DT AS SVC_MOD_OPT_DT FROM SVC_MOD_STS SMS ,SVC_MOD SM WHERE SMS.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND SMS.SVC_MACH_MSTR_PK = #svcMachMstrPk# AND SMS.SVC_TASK_NUM = #svcTaskNum# AND SMS.GLBL_CMPY_CD = SM.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND SMS.SVC_MOD_PK = SM.SVC_MOD_PK AND SM.SVC_MOD_PLN_ID = #svcModPlnId# AND SMS.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND SM.EZCANCELFLAG = '0'

SELECT FLP.MDSE_CD FROM MDSE_ITEM_FLIP_SET FLP WHERE FLP.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND FLP.RELN_MDSE_CD = #relnMdseCd#
#mdseItemRelnTpCd[]#
AND FLP.EZCANCELFLAG = '0'
